title: Which Apple TV Should You Buy
text:
Which Apple TV Should You Buy? 
Wired Saturday 24th October, 2015 
; the latest model comes in two sizes. Oh, and the previous version remains available too. For the first time in Apple TV history, you've got options. Now itâ€™s time to figure out which one's right for you. 
First, a word on what the new Apple TVs have in common: nearly everything. They're both recognizable squared-off hockey pucks. Both have access to Apple TV apps, which includes familiar content providers like HBO Now and Netflix, but also unexpected software, like digital discount clothier Gilt Groupe. Most importantly, there are games, some of them pretty impressive-looking, and co...
